title: Peter's chair
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Cynthia Freitag
brief_description: Using Ezra Jack Keats book as a basis, this film tells of the jealousy Peter feels at the arrival of his baby sister and how his world is put to rights again. Good use of music and amusing and entertaining voice-overs.
creator_credit_for_label: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Cynthia Freitag
